$interpreted: Jia-Shen: Feller's shadow gone and darn disappeared! If they don't get their darn butts here fast, that boat's a sailin'!
Flustered Gramps: Help! Oh, Lordie! Catch that thief! That's all I've got!
Thief: You dirty turtle, go die in a river! Best get outta my way!
Jia-Shen: I'm not...*sigh*...forget it. I don't even want to explain.
Flustered Gramps: The soldiers have been so busy with reconstruction that no one is here to uphold order. Thank you, sir. Thank you!
Jia-Shen: Easy as country pie~
Jia-Shen: ...*sigh*...no matter where the wind blows me, there's always someone tryin' ta pull one over on a poor, helpless fella...
Jia-Shen: Looks like even with the Kingdom of the Sun's help, bringing order back to this sandy kingdom will take many a sunrise.
Sophie: Ah, Jia-Shen!
Jia-Shen: Another person calling me a turtle, eh!? YOU'RE A TURTLE! Slow pokes...
Sophie: Sorry, sorry. We just went to visit Sanchez.
Sophie: But the cemetery was full of people...
Jia-Shen: Oh...yes, the cemetery that the Queen built to commemorate this tragedy.
Rune: Sanchez, is resting well.
Jia-Shen: Forgive me. I couldn't save your friend.
Rune: The Queen said...Jia-Shen used his countryside healing to save many people.
Rune: Jia-Shen did nothing...wrong.
Jia-Shen: ......
Sophie: Uh, yeahhh~Jia-Shen was so amazing! That handsome outfit must have been gifted by the Queen.
Rune: Jia-Shen is so...handsome.
Jia-Shen: Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. Nuttin' special...
Sophie: No, saving people is the greatest thing a tortoise can do. Your tribe would be so proud.
Jia-Shen: My tribe...
Jia-Shen: Yup. I've hidden my stinky head abouts these whereabouts a much too long. Gotta head home and face my sins...face to face.
Jia-Shen: Take it.
Sophie: Is this a boat ticket for prospecting in the Great Northern Lands? I heard these were super expensive and really hard to get!
Jia-Shen: Used all my contacts to get that sucker.
Jia-Shen: So, for all that nonsensical nonsense I caused ya'll before, let's call it even.
Rune: Elio also said that I'm from the north.
Sophie: Rune...do you want to go back there?
Rune: Yes. I want to know...where I came from.
Sophie: I see...
Sophie: Congratulations on finding your home. Ru-yi and the gang will be sad to see you go.
Sophie: Don't forget to come back and see us. You're always welcome in Morgan's Marvelous Circus!
Sophie: ......
Rune: Sophie!?
Sophie: Big dumb, dummy dumb, Rune is such a dumb-dumb!
Rune: Is Sophie...angry?
Sophie: Yeah, I'm angry! Aren't you supposed to chase me down, stop me from going? Don't you have anything you want to say to me?
Sophie: If I really leave it'll be too late! If I left like that, what would you do?
Sophie: If you go to the north, I'll never see you again－－
Rune: Rune...doesn't want to go to the north.
Sophie: Eh?
Rune: Elio is my friend. Let's find him...together.
Rune: Besides, I wouldn't leave Sophie's side...and go to the north all alone.
Sophie: Why not? That's your home.
Rune: Because I like Sophie－－
Sophie: Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-You said you...l-l-l-like me...
Rune: I like Sophie's circus. It makes people...smile. Gives them...hope.
Rune: Sophie really shines there.
Ru-yi: Aigh! Didn't need to say all that! Shoulda just said you liked her...ohoho...
Sophie: ......
Sophie: You guys...
Rune: Sophie?
Sophie: Well, let's get to finding Elio. Then, I'll go to the Great Northern Lands with you.

Jia-Shen: Walkin' n talkin' for hundreds o' miles,
Lookin' for signs of a silver-haired smile,
Searchin' for signs, yet none to be found,
Not yet, not yet, but one's comin' I'll bet!
Ru-yi: What about us!? We wanna come!
Hutchinson: If we tag along, will that...ruin the vibe?
Hanbei: Hmph. I ain't leaving her side until that dummy Sophie turns into a rotten egg!
Sophie: Uh-huh, let's do it together. How about we take the smiles of Morgan's Marvelous circus to the Great Northern Lands?

Model.Text: Feller's shadow gone and darn disappeared! If they don't get their darn butts here fast, that boat's a sailin'!
Help! Oh, Lordie! Catch that thief! That's all I've got!
You dirty turtle, go die in a river! Best get outta my way!
I'm not...*sigh*...forget it. I don't even want to explain.
The soldiers have been so busy with reconstruction that no one is here to uphold order. Thank you, sir. Thank you!
Easy as country pie~
...*sigh*...no matter where the wind blows me, there's always someone tryin' ta pull one over on a poor, helpless fella...
Looks like even with the Kingdom of the Sun's help, bringing order back to this sandy kingdom will take many a sunrise.
Ah, Jia-Shen!
Another person calling me a turtle, eh!? YOU'RE A TURTLE! Slow pokes...
Sorry, sorry. We just went to visit Sanchez.
But the cemetery was full of people...
Oh...yes, the cemetery that the Queen built to commemorate this tragedy.
Sanchez, is resting well.
Forgive me. I couldn't save your friend.
The Queen said...Jia-Shen used his countryside healing to save many people.
Jia-Shen did nothing...wrong.
Uh, yeahhh~Jia-Shen was so amazing! That handsome outfit must have been gifted by the Queen.
Jia-Shen is so...handsome.
Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey. Nuttin' special...
No, saving people is the greatest thing a tortoise can do. Your tribe would be so proud.
My tribe...
Yup. I've hidden my stinky head abouts these whereabouts a much too long. Gotta head home and face my sins...face to face.
Take it.
Is this a boat ticket for prospecting in the Great Northern Lands? I heard these were super expensive and really hard to get!
Used all my contacts to get that sucker.
So, for all that nonsensical nonsense I caused ya'll before, let's call it even.
Elio also said that I'm from the north.
Rune...do you want to go back there?
Yes. I want to know...where I came from.
I see...
Congratulations on finding your home. Ru-yi and the gang will be sad to see you go.
Don't forget to come back and see us. You're always welcome in Morgan's Marvelous Circus!
Sophie!?
Big dumb, dummy dumb, Rune is such a dumb-dumb!
Is Sophie...angry?
Yeah, I'm angry! Aren't you supposed to chase me down, stop me from going? Don't you have anything you want to say to me?
If I really leave it'll be too late! If I left like that, what would you do?
If you go to the north, I'll never see you again－－
Rune...doesn't want to go to the north.
Eh?
Elio is my friend. Let's find him...together.
Besides, I wouldn't leave Sophie's side...and go to the north all alone.
Why not? That's your home.
Because I like Sophie－－
Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-Y-You said you...l-l-l-like me...
I like Sophie's circus. It makes people...smile. Gives them...hope.
Sophie really shines there.
Aigh! Didn't need to say all that! Shoulda just said you liked her...ohoho...
You guys...
Sophie?
Well, let's get to finding Elio. Then, I'll go to the Great Northern Lands with you.

Walkin' n talkin' for hundreds o' miles,
Lookin' for signs of a silver-haired smile,
Searchin' for signs, yet none to be found,
Not yet, not yet, but one's comin' I'll bet!
What about us!? We wanna come!
If we tag along, will that...ruin the vibe?
Hmph. I ain't leaving her side until that dummy Sophie turns into a rotten egg!
Uh-huh, let's do it together. How about we take the smiles of Morgan's Marvelous circus to the Great Northern Lands?
